explains: n. 入口，进口；进入，进门；（演员的）登台，登场；进入权，进入许可；卷入，参与；着手，开始；就任，就职
wordGroup: college entrance examination 高考；大学入学考试
main entrance 大门，正门入口；主要入口
entrance exams 入学考试（entrance exam的复数）
entrance door 入口门，进口门
university entrance examination 高考；大学入学考试
front entrance 前门入口；正门入口
entrance gate 入口门；进水闸
no entrance 闲人免进；禁止入内
entrance requirement 入学要求；入学条件
entrance angle 入射角；进入角
entrance permit 进口许可证；入境许可证；入境证

sentences.en: This entrance is in constant use.
The entrance hall is littered with toys.
sentences.cn: 入口大厅里散落着玩具。

sentences.en: A lighthouse marks the entrance to the harbour.
sentences.cn: 灯塔是进入海港航道的标志。
